00049 std::string RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::HashPassword::encryptString(
00050                          const char *instr){
00051     string outstr="ERR";
00052 
00053     SHA1 sha;
00054     unsigned message_digest[5];
00055 
00056     sha.Reset();
00057     sha << instr;
00058 
00059     if (!sha.Result(message_digest)){
00060         cerr << "ERROR-- could not compute message digest" << endl;
00061     }
00062     else        {
00063         outstr=getMessageDigest(message_digest);
00064     }
00065 
00066     return outstr;
00067 }

00090 std::string RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::HashPassword::
00091                     getMessageDigest(unsigned *message_digest){
00092     ios::fmtflags       flags;
00093 
00094     ostringstream out;
00095 
00096     flags = out.setf(ios::hex|ios::uppercase,ios::basefield);
00097     out.setf(ios::uppercase);
00098 
00099     for(int i = 0; i < 5 ; i++){
00100         out << message_digest[i] << ' ';
00101     }
00102 
00103     //    cout << endl;
00104 
00105     //    cout.setf(flags);
00106     return out.str();
00107 }

00118 bool RainbruRPG::Network::Ident::HashPassword::compare(const char* p1, 
00119                                                        const char* p2){
00120 
00121   bool ret=true;
00122   char c1, c2;
00123 
00124   LOGI(p1);
00125   LOGI(p2);
00126 
00127   string s1(p1);
00128   string s2(p2);
00129 
00130 
00131   for (unsigned int i=0; i<s1.length()-1; i++){
00132     c1=s1[i];
00133     c2=s2[i];
00134     if (c1!=c2){
00135       ret=false;
00136     }
00137 
00138   }
00139 
00140   return ret;
00141 }
